title: Economist wants govt. plans reviewed following Rs. 50 bn flood damage
content: Now that the government has estimated the damages caused by floods at over Rs. 50 bn, it should take tangible measures to cut down on waste, corruption and irregularities to save money needed for relief programmes, says UNP Parliamentarian Dr. Harsha de Silva.
